summary: This document is an email chain regarding a quote for a rack and related equipment, sent from Justin Houston of SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions to a Communication Technician at the US Department of Justice's MCC-New York facility. It is a routine procurement communication.

persons.name: Justin Houston
persons.context: Employee of SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions who is providing a quote for a rack and related equipment to the US Department of Justice's MCC-New York facility.

events.title: Equipment Quote Request
events.description: A Communication Technician at MCC-New York requests a quote for a rack and related equipment, including an 8-port KVM switch, from SigNet Technologies.

locations: MCC-New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007-1704
SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions, 12300 Kiln Ct Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: The communication is a routine procurement email for equipment at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The email involves a contractor (SigNet Technologies/Convergint Federal Solutions) and a US Department of Justice employee.
The document date (April 18, 2019) is after Jeffrey Epstein's 2019 arrest and during his pre-trial detention period.
The document itself contains no direct references to Jeffrey Epstein, his case, or any related individuals.
The document is likely part of a broader collection due to its association with the MCC-New York facility.
